nl.inl.blacklab.index

Class IndexListenerReportConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.IndexListener
      • nl.inl.blacklab.index.IndexListenerReportConsole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileProcessor.ErrorHandler

    public class IndexListenerReportConsole
extends IndexListener
    Used to report progress while indexing, so we can give feedback to the user.

      • charsDone

        public void charsDone(long charsDone)
        Description copied from class: IndexListener
        Some number of characters has been processed. (this should be called regularly by the indexing class, so we can provide accurate progress reports) Synchronized to allow parallel indexing.
        Overrides:
        charsDone in class IndexListener
        Parameters:
        charsDone - the number of characters processed since the last call

      • indexEnd

        Description copied from class: IndexListener

      • errorOccurred

        public boolean errorOccurred(Throwable e,
                             String path,
                             File f)
        Description copied from interface: FileProcessor.ErrorHandler
        Report an error and decide whether to continue or not.
        Specified by:
        errorOccurred in interface FileProcessor.ErrorHandler
        Overrides:
        errorOccurred in class IndexListener
        Parameters:
        e - the exception
        path - path to the file that the error occurred in. This includes pathing in archives if the file is inside an archive.
        Returns:
        true if we should continue, false to abort
